survey_name: AI-Powered Personal Shopping Assistant Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of AI-powered personal shopping assistants to evaluate satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and gather suggestions for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal shopping assistant?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use an AI-powered personal shopping assistant?

questions.question_text: Which AI-powered personal shopping assistant(s) do you use?
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with text input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which AI-powered personal shopping assistant(s) do you use?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when using an AI shopping assistant? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question with a limit of 3 selections. Include an 'Other' option with text input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with selection limit of 3 and optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when using an AI shopping assistant? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of product recommendations from your AI shopping assistant?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale with clear labels for each point. Display as a single-choice radio button list.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with 5-point Likert scale

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of product recommendations from your AI shopping assistant?

questions.question_text: What types of products do you most frequently shop for using an AI assistant?
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with text input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: What types of products do you most frequently shop for using an AI assistant?

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using AI shopping assistants?
questions.client_notes: Use an open text field to allow detailed responses. Set a 500-character limit.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with character limit of 500

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using AI shopping assistants?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your AI shopping assistant to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use an 11-point NPS scale from 0-10 with clear endpoint labels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with 11-point NPS scale

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your AI shopping assistant to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features would you like to see improved in AI shopping assistants? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with text input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following features would you like to see improved in AI shopping assistants? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How comfortable are you with AI assistants making purchase decisions on your behalf?
answer_options: Very comfortable - I fully trust the AI's decisions
Somewhat uncomfortable - I prefer to approve all purchases
Very uncomfortable - I don't trust AI with purchasing decisions
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question with balanced positive/negative options.

script.question_text: How comfortable are you with AI assistants making purchase decisions on your behalf?
answer_options: Very comfortable - I fully trust the AI's decisions
Somewhat uncomfortable - I prefer to approve all purchases
Very uncomfortable - I don't trust AI with purchasing decisions

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in future AI shopping assistants?
questions.client_notes: Use an open text field to allow detailed responses. Set a 500-character limit.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with character limit of 500

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in future AI shopping assistants?
